title: Correction to: Characterization of the cryptic interspecific hybrid Lemna×mediterranea by an integrated approach provides new insights into duckweed diversity
content: This is a correction to: Luca Braglia, Simona Ceschin, M. Adelaide Iannelli, Manuela Bog, Marco Fabriani, Giovanna Frugis, Floriana Gavazzi, Silvia Gianì, Flaminia Mariani, Maurizio Muzzi, Emanuele Pelella, Laura Morello, Characterization of the cryptic interspecific hybrid Lemna×mediterranea by an integrated approach provides new insights into duckweed diversity, Journal of Experimental Botany, Volume 75, Issue 10, 2024, Pages 3092-3110, https://doi.org/10.1093/jxb/erae059
siteTitle: Journal of Experimental Botany Current Issue
